languages.text: "Атилиус, в этом нет нужды. Да, любой сервитор может поставить мне печать. Но может ли он при этом одарить меня искренней улыбкой или поразить своей безупречной выдержкой и вниманием к деталям? Не думаю. А ты — можешь".

traits.locale_text: "Атилиус, в этом нет нужды. Да, любой сервитор может поставить мне печать. Но может ли он при этом одарить меня искренней улыбкой или поразить своей безупречной выдержкой и вниманием к деталям? Не думаю. А ты — можешь".

languages.text: "Atilius, there is no need for that. Yes, any servitor can place a seal. But can it do so while granting me a sincere smile or impressing me with its impeccable finesse and attention to detail? I think not. But you can."
languages.original_text: "Атилиус, в этом нет нужды. Да, любой сервитор может поставить мне печать. Но может ли он при этом одарить меня искренней улыбкой или поразить своей безупречной выдержкой и вниманием к деталям? Не думаю. А ты — можешь".

traits.locale_text: "Atilius, there is no need for that. Yes, any servitor can place a seal. But can it do so while granting me a sincere smile or impressing me with its impeccable finesse and attention to detail? I think not. But you can."

"Atilius, there is no need for that. Yes, any servitor can place a seal. But can it do so while granting me a sincere smile or impressing me with its impeccable finesse and attention to detail? I think not. But you can."

"Atilius, there is no need for that. Yes, any servitor can place a seal. But can it do so while granting me a sincere smile or impressing me with its impeccable finesse and attention to detail? I think not. But you can."

"Atilius, there is no need for that. Yes, any servitor can place a seal. But can it do so while granting me a sincere smile or impressing me with its impeccable finesse and attention to detail? I think not. But you can."

languages.text: “没必要这么做，阿蒂利乌斯。没错，确实随便哪个机仆都能盖章，但机仆真的能一边盖章，一边对我露出真诚的微笑，同时以无可挑剔的技巧与细节让我赞叹不已吗？我觉得它们不能，但你能。”
languages.original_text: "Atilius, there is no need for that. Yes, any servitor can place a seal. But can it do so while granting me a sincere smile or impressing me with its impeccable finesse and attention to detail? I think not. But you can."

traits.locale_text: “没必要这么做，阿蒂利乌斯。没错，确实随便哪个奴工都能盖章，但奴工真的能一边盖章，一边对我露出真诚的微笑，同时以无可挑剔的技巧与细节让我赞叹不已吗？我觉得它们不能，但你能。”

languages.text: «Atilius, no es necesario. Sí, cualquier servidor puede colocar un sello. Pero ¿puede hacerlo con una sonrisa sincera o impresionarme con su delicadeza y atención al detalle? No. Pero usted sí».
languages.original_text: "Atilius, there is no need for that. Yes, any servitor can place a seal. But can it do so while granting me a sincere smile or impressing me with its impeccable finesse and attention to detail? I think not. But you can."

traits.locale_text: «Atilius, no es necesario. Sí, cualquier servidor puede colocar un sello. Pero ¿puede hacerlo con una sonrisa sincera o impresionarme con su delicadeza y atención al detalle? No. Pero usted sí».

languages.text: 「アティリウス、それには及ばない。確かに、サーヴィターなら誰でも封ろうできるだろう。だが、同時に心からの笑顔を私に向け、あるいは非の打ち所のない手腕と細部への留意を見せて感銘を与えられる者はいるだろうか？サーヴィターにはできまい。だが、お前にはそれができる」
languages.original_text: "Atilius, there is no need for that. Yes, any servitor can place a seal. But can it do so while granting me a sincere smile or impressing me with its impeccable finesse and attention to detail? I think not. But you can."

traits.locale_text: 「アティリウス、それには及ばない。確かに、サーヴィターなら誰でも封ろうできるだろう。だが、同時に心からの笑顔を私に向け、あるいは非の打ち所のない手腕と細部への留意を見せて感銘を与えられる者はいるだろうか？サーヴィターにはできまい。だが、お前にはそれができる」

languages.text: "Atilius, das ist nicht nötig. Ja, jeder Servitor kann ein Siegel platzieren. Aber kann er das auch, während er mich aufrichtig anlächelt oder mich mit seiner tadellosen Raffinesse und seinem Blick fürs Detail beeindruckt? Wohl kaum. Aber Ihr könnt es."
languages.original_text: "Atilius, there is no need for that. Yes, any servitor can place a seal. But can it do so while granting me a sincere smile or impressing me with its impeccable finesse and attention to detail? I think not. But you can."

traits.locale_text: "Atilius, das ist nicht nötig. Ja, jeder Servitor kann ein Siegel platzieren. Aber kann er das auch, während er mich aufrichtig anlächelt oder mich mit seiner tadellosen Raffinesse und seinem Blick fürs Detail beeindruckt? Wohl kaum. Aber Ihr könnt es."

languages.text: « Ce ne sera pas nécessaire, Atilius. Oui, n'importe quel servitor est capable de placer un sceau, mais peut-il le faire tout en me souriant avec sincérité ou en faisant étalage de sa finesse et de sa minutie ? Je ne crois pas. Vous, en revanche, vous le pouvez. »
languages.original_text: "Atilius, there is no need for that. Yes, any servitor can place a seal. But can it do so while granting me a sincere smile or impressing me with its impeccable finesse and attention to detail? I think not. But you can."

traits.locale_text: « Ce ne sera pas nécessaire, Atilius. Oui, n'importe quel servitor est capable de placer un sceau, mais peut-il le faire tout en me souriant avec sincérité ou en faisant étalage de sa finesse et de sa minutie ? Je ne crois pas. Vous, en revanche, vous le pouvez. »

languages.text: "Atilius, buna hiç gerek yok. Evet, mühürleri alelade bir hizmetör de yerleştirebilir. Peki bu işi yüzünde samimi bir gülümsemeyle yapabilir mi? Kusursuz ustalığı ve detaylara gösterdiği özenle beni etkileyebilir mi? Hiç sanmıyorum. Senin yerin ayrı."
languages.original_text: "Atilius, there is no need for that. Yes, any servitor can place a seal. But can it do so while granting me a sincere smile or impressing me with its impeccable finesse and attention to detail? I think not. But you can."

traits.locale_text: "Atilius, buna hiç gerek yok. Evet, mühürleri alelade bir servitör de yerleştirebilir. Peki bu işi yüzünde samimi bir gülümsemeyle yapabilir mi? Kusursuz ustalığı ve detaylara gösterdiği özenle beni etkileyebilir mi? Hiç sanmıyorum. Senin yerin ayrı."
